product_name: The North Face Base Camp Duffel Special Edition - Small
long_description: The Special Edition of The North Face Base Camp small-size duffel offers rugged resilience like the standard version, but features deluxe embossed shell material, leather trim and metal hardware. Small 42-liter The North Face Base Camp duffel provides storage for trips of 3 days or less. Made from heavy-duty 300-denier phthalate-free thermoplastic elastomer laminate and 840-denier ballistics nylon, this duffel is ready for anything you can dish at it. Features rugged construction with extra bartacks, double stitching and durable metal. Linen-like embossing adds textural interest to the shell material; leather accents are featured on haul handles, shoulder straps and ID window. Main compartment features a D-shaped zippered opening with zipper flap; internal mesh pockets offer organization. Duffel-style handles and twin haul handles on ends provide carrying options; shaped shoulder straps provide comfortable, easy hauling as a backpack. The North Face Base Camp small-size duffel includes 4 side compression straps, dual daisy chains along sides. Zippers are travel-lock compatible (locks sold separately).
short_description: The Special Edition of The North Face Base Camp small-size duffel offers rugged resilience like the standard version, but features deluxe embossed shell material, leather trim and metal hardware.
